description: Singer-songwriter Josh Groban joined ABC’s Jimmy Kimmel Live Monday night to pay tribute to Donald Trump.
title: Singer Josh Groban Performs Donald Trump Tweets for Jimmy Kimmel
title_page: Singer Josh Groban Performs Donald Trump Tweets for Jimmy Kimmel
text:
Singer-songwriter Josh Groban joined ABC’s Jimmy Kimmel Live Monday night to pay tribute to Donald Trump, by performing some of the Republican presidential candidate’s memorable unfiltered tweets.
In an infomercial parody similar to a Time Life CD pitch, Groban sits alone at a piano and introduces a number of classic, and out-of-context, Trump Twitter insults through song.
Groban states, “Donald Trump’s tweets will make you laugh, they’ll make you cry, but mostly they’ll make you cry.”
A voiceover artist then says, “Buy now and get the exclusive new bonus track, “Losers & Haters,” absolutely free.”
Watch the video:
Groban previously joined the show in 2011 to perform posts from Kanye West’s official Twitter account.
